long_description: Add some pizzazz to your cool-weather wardrobe with the warm Patagonia Better jacket for women. Its urban-savvy exterior hides a mountain-ready polyester fleece lining for warmth in any setting. The Patagonia Better jacket for women is made from a richly textured, cross-dyed fabric with a soft fleece interior and a heathered, sweater-knit face that resists pilling. Princess seams soften the style and give a contoured, feminine fit. Front placket has a 2-button closure at the tall, stand-up neck and a single-button closure at the waist. Cargo pockets secure with button closures; reinforced elbow patches. The women's Patagonia Better jacket is hip length.
short_description: Add some pizzazz to your cool-weather wardrobe with the warm Patagonia Better jacket for women. Its urban-savvy exterior hides a mountain-ready polyester fleece lining for warmth in any setting.
